title: Can't process payment using Paypal. Client gets stuck buffering before Paypal page opens
body:
Edit: Fixed itself, all good now.
Expected: 1. Click Purchase RP ✓
Expected: 2. Choose Paypal Payment Method ✓
Expected: 3. Choose $50.00 ✓
Expected: 4. Choose next ✓
Expected: 5. Log into Paypal and finish payment. ✘ Result: Page continues to buffer then get an unexpected error message.

[Buffer page](http://i.imgur.com/ET2Kfgu.png) 
[Unexpected error message.](http://i.imgur.com/CF3XDHV.png)

replies.body:
Hey there,

Glad to hear this issue resolved itself.
